payload.content: Using AI to process notes can lead to a 'verbatim trap' where output appears processed but lacks genuine transformation or engagement with meaning.

name: Using AI to process notes can lead to a 'verbatim trap' where output appears pro
content: Using AI to process notes can lead to a 'verbatim trap' where output appears processed but lacks genuine transformation or engagement with meaning.

payload.content: Cornell Note-Taking research identified that without active processing, note-taking becomes passive transcription, where students copy words without understanding, leading to complete-looking notes but no actual learning.

name: Cornell Note-Taking research identified that without active processing, note-tak
content: Cornell Note-Taking research identified that without active processing, note-taking becomes passive transcription, where students copy words without understanding, leading to complete-looking notes but no actual learning.

payload.content: AI summarizers can fall into the same passive transcription trap as human note-takers.

name: AI summarizers can fall into the same passive transcription trap as human note-t
content: AI summarizers can fall into the same passive transcription trap as human note-takers.

payload.content: The 'verbatim risk' in agentic systems occurs when an agent processes content without generating anything new (e.g., connections, sharpened claims, implications), merely reorganizing existing words.

name: The 'verbatim risk' in agentic systems occurs when an agent processes content wi
content: The 'verbatim risk' in agentic systems occurs when an agent processes content without generating anything new (e.g., connections, sharpened claims, implications), merely reorganizing existing words.

payload.content: Passive processing by an AI is like expensive transcription, just moving words around.

name: Passive processing by an AI is like expensive transcription, just moving words a
content: Passive processing by an AI is like expensive transcription, just moving words around.

payload.content: The key difference between effective and ineffective agentic processing is 'transformation,' not just effort or token count.

name: The key difference between effective and ineffective agentic processing is 'tran
content: The key difference between effective and ineffective agentic processing is 'transformation,' not just effort or token count.

payload.content: To avoid the verbatim trap, build a test into AI processing workflows: 'Did this produce anything the source didn't already contain?'

name: To avoid the verbatim trap, build a test into AI processing workflows: 'Did this
content: To avoid the verbatim trap, build a test into AI processing workflows: 'Did this produce anything the source didn't already contain?'

payload.content: When prompting an AI for knowledge processing, demand transformation by asking for connections to existing notes, tensions with beliefs, implications not drawn by the author, or questions needing answers.

name: When prompting an AI for knowledge processing, demand transformation by asking f
content: When prompting an AI for knowledge processing, demand transformation by asking for connections to existing notes, tensions with beliefs, implications not drawn by the author, or questions needing answers.
